name: BRUTAL RAGE
description:
BREATHTAKING ! BRUTAL RAGE - Demo is available on itch.io !

Demo content :

- The training level (tutorial)
- A short version of the 3rd episode (story mode)
- 1 of the 3 playable characters available on the final game !
- Fully compatible with gamepad

This game is currently in development ;)

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING BRUTAL RAGE DEMO !
DO NOT HESITATE TO RECORD AND SHARE YOUR GAMEPLAY !

GAME DESCRIPTION

BRUTAL RAGE is a co-operative or single player scrolling beat’em up game.
The game is an homage to classic 90s beat 'em ups.
This game will brings you back to the golden age of arcade games

STORY

In a corrupted city the crime reigns
They agent Kurt,Mac and Eddy are the best cops of the city
but someone has trapped them !
Embark on a brutal path of blood for retribution
Escape from the prison and prove your innocence

GAME FEATURES

-Play with you friend in a local Co-Op campaign
-3 playable characters : Kurt,Mac & Eddy with their own fighting style
-6 Episodes and more than 18 stages
-Use your rage to beat your enemies and bring the justice
-Use a variety of weapons including bats, knives, guns, and more.
-Retro pixel art graphics
